title: Cylinder
description: A cylinder, truncated cone, or cone defined by a length, top radius, and bottom radius.

show.description: Whether or not the cylinder is shown.

topRadius.description: The radius of the top of the cylinder.

bottomRadius.description: The radius of the bottom of the cylinder.

fill.description: Whether or not the cylinder is filled.

material.description: The material to display on the surface of the cylinder.

outline.description: Whether or not the cylinder is outlined.

outlineColor.description: The color of the cylinder outline.

outlineWidth.description: The width of the cylinder outline.

numberOfVerticalLines.description: The number of vertical lines to draw along the perimeter for the outline.

slices.description: The number of edges around the perimeter of the cylinder.

shadows.description: Whether or not the cylinder casts or receives shadows.

distanceDisplayCondition.description: The display condition specifying the distance from the camera at which this cylinder will be displayed.
